section.title:
shipping labels printing by sales order
sales orders printing shipping labels for Print Shipping Labels by S/O #
section.para: To print Shipping labels by Sales Order Number, select the "Print Shipping Labels by S/O #" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Print Shipping Labels by Sales Order Number

section.para: When printing Shipping labels by Sales Order Number, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Sales Order Number of the Sales Order whose Shipping labels you want to print.
Specify the name of the Shipping Label Form you want to print.
Specify the range of Shipping labels you want to print.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without printing any Shipping labels, returning you to the application desktop.
Prints specified number of Shipping label copies for the specified Sales Order.
